Posts.Content: May 5, 2007 07:06AM jlg55 wrote: TerryNY - most oncologists use a software model of your specific stats (size of tumor, etc) to determine a benefit percentage of chemo. It is not an exact science as they can't really guarantee results one way or the other but it may give you some confidence that you are doing the right thing for yourself.
